Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

        public void addPowerUp(GameManager gameManager,
                       PowerUp powerUp)
        the player adds a powerUp in his hand this can surpass the limit of 3 powerUps in the hand. But this is only when the player needs to spawn so he needs to discard one powerUp to complete the operation
        Parameters:

      • drawPowerUp

        public PowerUp drawPowerUp(GameManager gameManager,
                           PowerUp powerUp)
        the player draws a powerUp if another power up cannot be drawn, it returns the power up that has removed from the deck or it will be lost return null otherwise

      • discardPowerUpForAmmos

        public void discardPowerUpForAmmos(PowerUp p,
                                   GameManager gameManager)
        method used after the player has chosen to discard a powerUp for the cost. it temporarily add another ammo related to the color of the powerUp IMPORTANT: this method can surpass the limit of 3 ammo per color but it's just temporary. after paying the cost, everything will be under the rules
        Parameters:
        p - the powerUp discarded
        gameManager -
